rows.label: qev092902_MSG0010
rows.name: Oh, I'm sorry. I forgot to introduce myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0020
rows.name: My name is Neilnail. But you can call me Neil.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0030
rows.name:
Incidentally, is this your first time
seeing a Qlurian in the flesh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_JNK0040
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev092902_SEL0050
rows.name:
Nod to indicate this is the first time
you've seen a Qlurian.

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0060
rows.name: Aha. Yeah, that's what I thought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0070
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0080
rows.name: Explain that you've met one of her kind before.

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0090
rows.name:
Really? Now that IS a surprise.
I hope you'll introduce me sometime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0100
rows.name:
We're uncommon.
We Qlurians rarely leave our home planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0105
rows.name: Even I don't bump into many out here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0110
rows.name: Just to double-check, though...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0120
rows.name:
Your organization. BLADE, was that the name?
It's a paramilitary group equipped for combat...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0130
rows.name: That about right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0140
rows.name:
Okay, good!
That's exactly the sort of thing I'm looking for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0150
rows.name: But then, it being a "high-risk job"...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0160
rows.name:
there's a ton of red tape to go through.
The big cheeses need to sign off on it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0170
rows.name:
They're even more fussy when a xeno like me is involved.
Nobody wants a diplomatic incident, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0180
rows.name:
I was ready to give up and go it alone, but you showed up
right in the nick of time. It's my lucky day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0190
rows.name:
From what I can see, some BLADEs are willing
to accept jobs at their own discretion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0200
rows.name: That'd be an accurate assessment, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_JNK0210
rows.name: Make a Snap Decision

rows.label: qev092902_SEL0220
rows.name:
Willingly accept the task
without a second thought.

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0230
rows.name:
I haven't even told you what the job is yetâ€”
talk about living life on the edge![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0240
rows.name: You're a fearless one, aren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0250
rows.name: Think It Through

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0260
rows.name:
Reserve judgment until you've
heard all the details.

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0270
rows.name:
Of course, that's sensible.
All right, let me lay it out for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0280
rows.name:
In the area that you humans call Oblivia,
there's a huge ring-shaped structure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0290
rows.name: I want to investigate it. Personally.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0310
rows.name:
You see, I'm a researcher of what in
your language you'd call "archaeology."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0320
rows.name: My main focus is...ancient alien ruins and literary archives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0325
rows.name: In short, you might call me a "cosmoarchaeologist."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0330
rows.name:
Now, if that ring structure
is anything like the thing I think it is,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0335
rows.name: it may not be quite as innocuous as it seems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0340
rows.name:
I'd like to hurry up and analyze its true nature.
For that, I'd need to do some field work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0350
rows.name:
Except, as you might be aware,
that area is teeming with hostile indigens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0360
rows.name:
Basically, I need you to protect me from danger,
long enough for me to complete my survey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0370
rows.name:
That would be the gist of my request.
How about it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0380
rows.name: I'll fight too if the going gets tough, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0390
rows.name:
I promise you, I've been in my fair share of scrapes.
Exploring ruins is no picnic![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0400
rows.name: All right, that'll be enough chitchat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0410
rows.name:
Let the journey to the giant ring begin!
And thanks again for this![ST:wait ]
